title: Race Horses @ Jukebox
body:
The 16th of April see’s an independent music match in heaven as psychedelic folk punk outfit Race Horses come to Newcastle’s Jukebox accompanied by the decidedly moody post punk band Cult Image.

The odd juxtaposition of the two sounds seems worthy of the £5 admission in itself, throw in Race Horses’s recent inclusion in the NME and you’d be a fool to turn down such an opportunity. I guess I’ll see you there then.

[http://www.myspace.com/racehorsesmusic](http://www.myspace.com/racehorsesmusic)

[http://www.myspace.com/ignoranceinthunorf](http://www.myspace.com/ignoranceinthunorf)
